name: Border Gradients
description: Generate border gradients with the rounded utility class.
author: batistein

name: Patterns
description: Provides 150+ free svg patterns you can use as background image with utility classes.
author: beaubus

name: Animate
description: A plugin for creating beautiful animations.
author: jamiebuilds

name: Wind Themes
description: A lightweight Tailwind CSS plugin that handles multiple themes.
author: vaibhavshn

name: Typography
description: Provides a set of prose classes you can use to add beautiful typographic defaults to any vanilla HTML.
author: tailwindlabs

name: Forms
description: A plugin that provides a basic reset for form styles that makes form elements easy to override with utilities.
author: tailwindlabs

name: CSS Variables
description: A plugin allows you to configure CSS variables in the tailwind.config.js.
author: mertasan

name: Card
description: Add a card components to your project.
author: NathanHeffley

name: CSS Debug Screens
description: A component that shows the currently active screen (responsive breakpoint).
author: jorenvanhee

name: FormKit
description: This package contains tooling to assist with building a comprehensive Tailwind theme for FormKit.
author: formkit

name: Container Query
description: A plugin that provides CSS Container Queries.
author: dgknca
